item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
So, anyone else notice the 'Anne Summers' npc vendor there?
...and also the fact she's a cheese vendor :|
item.content:encoded:
So, anyone else notice the ‘Anne Summers’ npc vendor there?

…and also the fact she’s a cheese vendor üòê

item.title: By: Torcie
item.dc:creator: Torcie
item.description:
I am less interested in his 32k gold than I am in HOW THE HELL he has so many empty bag slots?
WTF?
Damn warlocks.
item.content:encoded:
I am less interested in his 32k gold than I am in HOW THE HELL he has so many empty bag slots?

WTF?

Damn warlocks.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: Aww, man! The fanged-winged-antlered half-owlbear half-bunny thingie is my new favorite pet! And for once players didn't have to spend half a day questing to get the dang specialty pet!
item.content:encoded: Aww, man! The fanged-winged-antlered half-owlbear half-bunny thingie is my new favorite pet! And for once players didn’t have to spend half a day questing to get the dang specialty pet!

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
<blockquote>Got a freak-of-nature winged rabbit thingy pet.</blockquote>
Freak of nature is right. How many different mutations in that gene pool do ya think?
item.content:encoded:
Got a freak-of-nature winged rabbit thingy pet.

Freak of nature is right. How many different mutations in that gene pool do ya think?

item.title: By: Bitt
item.dc:creator: Bitt
item.description: Brewfest has really put a spotlight on the morons and jerks out there. My ignore list hasn't been this active in a long time.
item.content:encoded: Brewfest has really put a spotlight on the morons and jerks out there. My ignore list hasn’t been this active in a long time.

item.title: By: Ratshag
item.dc:creator: Ratshag
item.description:
I had me some fun at beerfest last night. Got plastered. Got hit on. Got a freak-of-nature winged rabbit thingy pet. Gonna keep goin' back til I get me a ram. It's a dang shame da whole thing is such a clusterfluhg. "Here's quests" "No there ain't" "Reward is X" "No, it's Y" "Dwarves!" "No dwarves!" Argh.
And yeah, more stuff what ya gotta keep in yer bags.
item.content:encoded:
I had me some fun at beerfest last night. Got plastered. Got hit on. Got a freak-of-nature winged rabbit thingy pet. Gonna keep goin’ back til I get me a ram. It’s a dang shame da whole thing is such a clusterfluhg. “Here’s quests” “No there ain’t” “Reward is X” “No, it’s Y” “Dwarves!” “No dwarves!” Argh.

And yeah, more stuff what ya gotta keep in yer bags.
